verbose_text: Thus, miR-375 contributes to acquisition of resistance to paclitaxel in cervical cancer cells [XREF_BIBR], while Ke et al. showed that miR-181a increases cellular resistance to radiotherapy [XREF_BIBR] through negative regulation of proapoptotic protein kinase (PRKCD), which suppresses radiation induced apoptosis and decreases G2/M stage block.
